schema\_dual\_column.standard\_formal: Let T be a tensor with free index set F and contracted index pair set C. Any Σ-contraction over C must produce a tensor T' whose free index set F' satisfies F' \= F \\ C.
schema\_dual\_column.igsoa\_formal: For any Domain Tensor D with index set I \= F ∪ C and Σ-contraction plan P: Σ\_P(D) is defined only if P removes exactly the indices in C and preserves the order and multiplicity of F in the result.
